title: International Journal of Soft Computing and Engineering
abstract: 1 Published By: Blue Eyes Intelligence Engineering and Sciences Publication (BEIESP) © Copyright: All rights reserved. Retrieval Number: 100.1/ijsce.A35230911121 DOI: 10.35940/ijsce.A3523.0911121 Journal Website: www.ijsce.org Abstract: Recently a rapid increase has been seen in the technology and health care became an unavoidable sector because an enormous amount of data is collected day to day. The Big data analytics has many uses and it is associated to big data. It gives an important judgment in the area of health care. This paper aims to present a review of big data in health care that how big data can aid the healthcare. In this paper multiple research paper has been reviewed and the limitations and research gaps of these papers has been discussed accordingly.

citations.title: Intelligent bearing fault diagnosis using swarm decomposition method and new hybrid particle swarm optimization algorithm
